game.description: The village of Greenhaven is plagued by a group of bandits who have taken over the old windmill on the outskirts of town. The villagers are too afraid to confront them, and it's up to you to put an end to their nefarious activities.
game.objective: Defeat the bandit leader and clear out the windmill.

tasks.description: Gather information about the bandits from the villagers.
Scout out the windmill and identify any guards or traps.
tasks.objective: Reach the top floor without being detected

tasks.description: Infiltrate the windmill and defeat the bandit leader.

game.title: Cleaning out the Windmill
